content:
lead 100k men to 250mi march --> 60mi wide march
goal: weaken morale of men in the front by waging war against their homes
	as they march thru south, they were not only beating up the confeds but also destroying cotton fields, barns, houses, confiscating/killing animals, pulling up and twisting rail tracks

went to Atlanta GA and burned it - important cuz this capture probs won the election of 1864 for lincoln (recall that he was losing it)

went to Savanna, GA

went to Columbia SC, seized and burned - capital of SC, leading city of succession in the start of confed union
